name: Hutt Influence (V)
Lore: 'Jabba''s criminal empire extends to all reaches of the Outer Rim.',
Text: 'Deploy on a pit. ''Imperial'' on Human Shield may be treated as ''bounty hunter''. While I Shall Enjoy Watching You Die on table, bounty hunters are forfeit +2 and immune to Goo Nee Tay. Once per game, if Nal Hutta on table, may take All Wrapped Up into hand from Reserve Deck; reshuffle. (Immune to Alter.)',
